subject: [R] Marginal Effects from GLM
body:
Dear Friends,

Is there a direct way to extract the marginal effects when running discrete choice models such as Probit or Logit using glm? 

Thanks and Regards

Anup

       
---------------------------------
Ahhh...imagining that irresistible "new car" smell?
